content.query:
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://lakeiqbetim.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/nyc_taxi/taxi_zone.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
WITH (
    LocationID INT,
    Borough VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    Zone VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    service_zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
) AS [result];



EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''https://lakeiqbetim.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/nyc_taxi/taxi_zone.csv'',
    FORMAT = ''CSV'',
    PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
WITH (
    LocationID INT,
    Borough VARCHAR(50),
    Zone VARCHAR(100),
    service_zone VARCHAR(50)
) AS [result]'

SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases;

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE lakeiqbetim
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://lakeiqbetim.dfs.core.windows.net/'
)


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE lakeiqbetim_raw
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://lakeiqbetim.dfs.core.windows.net/raw_2'
)


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE lakeiqbetim_bronze
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://lakeiqbetim.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze'
);












SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'nyc_taxi/taxi_zone.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'lakeiqbetim_bronze',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
WITH (
    LocationID INT,
    Borough VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    Zone VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    service_zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
) AS [result];


SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources
